name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour
overview: Take on Tiger Woods and other golfing greats from past & present in Tiger Woods PGA Tour on the Playstation Portable handheld video game system. Create your own golfer, develop your skills and step on to the green to challenge the masters on some of the world’s top courses. Play against Vijay Singh, Arnold Palmer and, of course, Tiger Woods in an effort to become a golf legend. Raise the stakes by playing in wireless multiplayer and showing your friends who will take home the prize.
